name: StreetPass Mii Plaza: Update
description:
StreetPass Mii Plaza received an
update and five new games are
now available! And that's not
all - one will be for free!

■ For your free game, you can
select one of these two (the other
will be available for purchase):
- StreetPass Slot Racer
- StreetPass Trader

■ These new games are also
available for purchase now:
- StreetPass Ninja
- StreetPass Explorers
- StreetPass Chef

■ StreetPass Mii Plaza Premium
users can now store up to 100
encounters in a queue at the
plaza entrance

■ Some other adjustments have
been made to make StreetPass
Mii Plaza quicker, especially on
New Nintendo 3DS systems.
disclaimer:
This will update StreetPass Mii Plaza.
After downloading this data, no new
icon will be added to the HOME
Menu. The data can be found under
System Settings => Data Management
=> Nintendo 3DS => Add-on
Content. Be careful not to delete it.
